actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Making urgent supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1991 for emergency refugee and migration assistance for the people of Iraq who are displaced as a result of civil conflict.

summary.text: Makes supplemental appropriations for the Emergency Refugee and Migration Assistance Fund for humanitarian assistance to the people of Iraq who are displaced as a result of the civil conflict.

titles.title: Making urgent supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1991 for emergency refugee and migration assistance for the people of Iraq who are displaced as a result of civil conflict.
